page.title: 12JARROW POLICE STATION
page.content: In{Clervaux Terrace}there is a {Police {Station}.The Police Station was founded in 1934.The middle of the building was used as the Police Station itself,the two wings on either side were used as accommodation for the Chief Inspectors and the Chief Superintendents.Now the building is just a Police Station, it has{17 {traffic cars},they are nicknamed{ {jam sandwiches}because they have a red stripe on their white body.Ath the station there are also 'Panda' patrol cars and vans,one of which is used by the{Dog Section.}This is made up of six Dog Handlers and ten dogs. There are also six{unmarked cars}for the detectives.At the rear of the building there is accommodation for police families and a large car park for vehicles damaged in accidents.
